title: Voss' Silver Sword
content:
a +1d4 bonus to Damage and Attack Rolls against githyanki, aberrations, fiends, and elementals.

Wrathful Smite: Possibly Frightens your target. They will be easier to hit and cannot move.

BG3 Voss' Silver Sword Location & Where to Find

Location: Quest: The Githyanki Warrior Dropped by: Kith'rak Voss. Can be purchased from Voss when engaging in conversation with him in Act 3.
